resources.string: This feature needs you to be logged in.\nWould you like to sign in now?
Login using your cinequest.org interactive scheduler account email and password.
Don\'t have a cinequest.org interactive scheduler account yet?
The account is free and will allow your to save / update / download schedules you have created online or on the phone.
Conflicting schedule on server!! Which one to keep?

Your schedule will be shown in this tab. Please select films and events in this application to create your schedule. When you are finished creating your schedule, you will have option to sync it with server by pressing the menu button on your phone.
This feature needs you to be logged in. \nWould you like to sign in now?
No network connection available. Please connect to Internet first!
